content: k1 with c1 k1 with c2 k1 of round 16 sts cut c2 with c1 k1 with c2 k5* repeat to end of round round 5 with c1 k2tog to end of round 8 sts round 7 *with c2 k1 with c1 k1 with c2 k1 with c1 k1 cut c1 leaving a 6 tail weave through remaining sts with c2 k6* repeat to end of round weave in ends block toque ©2020 yarn twisters 2 plaid toque pattern instructions cont d all other sizes decreases and finishing repeat rnds 1 to 5 one more time round 6 *with c1 k1 c2 k1 c1 k1 c2 k1 c1 k1 with c2 k5* repeat to end of round round 7 *with c2 k1 c1 cdd c2 k1 with c2 k1 cdd k1* repeat until end of round 60 72 sts round 8 *with c1 k1 c2 k1 c1 k1 with c2 k3* repeat to end of round round 9 *with c1 cdd with c2 cdd* repeat until end of round 20 24 sts cut c2 round 10 with c1 k2tog to end of round 10 12 sts cut c1 leaving a 6 tail weave through remaining sts weave in ends block toque ©2020 yarn twisters 3 plaid toque
